name: Spaced Out Love
description:
A Meteor in search for love is attacked by humans protecting the Earth.

The controls are rather straightforward, up/down for moving the main character, p for pause and r for reset.

This short game is also the first one we realized during a game jam (a 48h one). Our three members programmer team used that jam in order to discover Unity and we are pretty happy about the final result, hence the motivation to share it.
